to write <toolkit:DataGridImageColumn Binding="{Binding Path=Img}" > for example.any suggestions or I can do it only by digging into the code of the datagrid?
You are familiar with DataGridCustomTemplateColumn.cs or DataGridTemplateColumn.cs?  See the code for DataGridCustomTemplateColumn.cs in the sample.
